Attacks.Name: Aqua Tail
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away short range.

Attacks.Name: Water Pulse
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Water Absorb
Superpowers.Effect: When Vaporeon is targeted by a Water-type attack, it takes no damage and gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Mist
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an allied character within Range 3. That character gains immunity to special conditions until the start of your next turn.

Attacks.Name: Surf
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters within its area of effect.
